1121790.name: RAD - Arcade Style Pack
1121790.description:
Arcade Style Pack includes 2 alternative character styles and a joystick bat.
Say hello to the newest additions to the rad cast of heroes. Choose between Glitch or Turbo as you head out into the devastated wastelands while rockin’ the freshest arcade-styled gear in the Fallow. Also don't forget to grab that awesome JoyStick Bat that has sweet pixel powers behind its attacks.
1121790.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
